author: Priyadarshini Paitandy, Soma Basu, Nahla Nainar, Chitra Deepa Anantharam, PRIYADERSHINI S, Divya Kala Bhavani, Harikumar J S, Aparna Narrain
title: Coronavirus lockdown: How are people across the world spending their days at home
description: Does the idea of a 21-day lockdown make you anxious? Are you missing your family, and the joys of community? You are not alone. MetroPlus talks to people who are in self-isolation all over the world to demonstrate that now, more than ever, we are all in this …
content:
Giulia Grimaldi Turin, Italy; Digital Content Editor
I have been locked down in my apartment since Wednesday, March 11. I live alone, with my laptop, a few cactuses and a stuffed cat. I am on the fourth floor of a used-to-be-lively neighbourhood in Turin, No… [+30835 chars]
